PROJECT AIR LEAK DETECTION SYSTEM The main aim of our project is intimate the alarm signal when there is any leakage in the fuel tank. Air leakage detector is a project to intimate the alarm signal when there is any leakage in the
tank. T he field of mechanical engineering has a theme word called change as its backbone. In our
project the main parameter is pneumatic pressure (30m to 40m bar). The main components of project are sensor units, microcontroller units, power supply units,
display units. Sensor are using for detection of electromagnetic radiation from the natural sources. Then
this signal will transfer to microcontroller units. The main function of microcontroller is storage unit.
Then this data will transfer to display unit as a buzzer sounds.

Position: FIRE FIGHTING TECHNICIAN
Period: APR 2016 – JAN 2017
Duties & Responsibilities
To visit and inspect sites for their fire prevention system installation for sanction of fire safety
certificates
Attend to all calls and resolve customer queries pertaining to various fire related issues
Maintain best possible working conditions with regards to fire safety
Impart training to subordinates and new joiners for operating fire equipment and other
firefighting services
To help organizations design and develop fire exit plans
To coordinate with event organizers for installing necessary fire systems
Assist Chief Investigating Officer in examining the causes of fire
Regularly check all fire extinguishers and fire equipment for serviceability
Maintain record of all fire services delivered
Generate necessary reports for management to review daily performance
